before the

CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:04): empty{{html}}{{/html}}x CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:04):  = H = CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:04): no
CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:04): (Didn't mean to put the space before the "= H ="  only difference is the 'x') CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:05): It can also be a space. CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:05): Correct? CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:44): Clearer example: CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:44): a{{html}}{{/html}}\n=b= CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:44): outputs CalebJamesDeLisl - (08:44):

a

b

seems out of place so I wanted to verify. flaviusolaru1 joined #xwiki at 08:51 flaviusolaru left at 08:51 (Ping timeout: 258 seconds vmassol left at 09:00 (Quit: Leaving. florinciu joined #xwiki at 09:10 bblfish joined #xwiki at 10:01 gvallarelli joined #xwiki at 10:20 gvallarelli - (10:20): hi lucaa joined #xwiki at 10:20 CalebJamesDeLisl - (10:34): hi gvallarelli, re your fiat pic yesterday: old vid I found when I was in school http://www.streetfire.net/video/400hp-diesel-fiat-126-vs-gallardo-14mile\_15816.htm gvallarelli - (10:35): eheheh :) CalebJamesDeLisl - (10:38): A correctly sized pair of turbos is surprisingly effective and diesels don't knock so the sky is the limit for boost pressure. CalebJamesDeLisl - (10:53): I don't like cars in general, they vacuum up money. I do like complaining about how they are designed wrong. CalebJamesDeLisl - (10:54): looks like someone got a patent on slapping a capacitor in the ignition wire.
